entry.def: A peepshow is box containing moving pictures which you can look at through a small hole. Peepshows used to be a form of entertainment at fairs.

means.word_mean: 1. an exhibition of pictures or objects viewed through a small hole or magnifying glass
2. a short pornographic film shown in a small coin-operated booth
